violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: .DS_Store is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.
violation.context: # Ignore OS Generated Meta Files .DS_Store .DS_Store? ._* .Spotlight-V100 .Trashes ehthumbs.db

violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: ehthumbs.db is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.
violation.context:
.DS_Store .DS_Store? ._* .Spotlight-V100 .Trashes ehthumbs.db Thumbs.db
# Ignore file containing API Keys .api_keys **/license.lic

violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: Thumbs.db is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.
violation.context:
.DS_Store? ._* .Spotlight-V100 .Trashes ehthumbs.db Thumbs.db
# Ignore file containing API Keys .api_keys **/license.lic
